flawed_nl_solution:
At the first pick-up point, the number of people who entered the bus was 3/5 of its carrying capacity, a total of 3/5*80 = <<3/5*80=400/3>>400/3
The available seats in the bus after the first pick up point is 80-400/3 = <<80-400/3=-160/3>>-160/3
If there were 50 people in the second pick-up station, and only -160/3 sits were available, the number of people who did not take the bus because it was full is 50--160/3=<<50--160/3=310/3>>310/3
#### 310/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 400/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
